  3. Fly To The Sky

Brian Joo

Hwanhee

Introduction

Fly to the Sky is a South Korean R&B duo consisting of Brian Joo and Hwanhee. They debuted on November 21, 1999, under SM Entertainment with the album Day by Day.
Originally promoted as pop idols, they transitioned to a mature R&B style by their third album, which earned them critical recognition. After leaving SM in 2004, they continued their success with albums like Transition and No Limitations. The duo went on hiatus in 2009 to pursue solo work but reunited in 2014 with the album Continuum.

As of 2025, Fly to the Sky remains active, celebrated for their vocal talent and influence on Korean R&B.
